title: import_movies
description: JSON Schema for electron microscopy import movies part of processing

Sampling_rate.description: Sampling rate in angstroms per pixel

Dose_per_image.description: Dose per image given in electrons per square Angstrom

Initial_dose.description: Initial dose in electrons per square Angstrom

Spherical_aberration.description: Spherical aberration of microscope in mm

Gain_image.description: Wether a gain image was used

Dark_image.description: Wether a dark image was used
